text: Krishna Aur Kans is a 2012 Hindi animated movie made by Reliance Entertainment. Vikram Veturi directed it. The film was tax-free in six states when it came out and was available in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and English. A new mobile game was also launched for Janmashtami based on the movie. It was the most widely released animated movie in India. Category:Animated movies
title: Krishna Aur Kans
